title: Packaging materials - market share in the global packaging market 2003 to 2009
summary: This statistic shows the Packaging materials market of share Metal care Other_packaging_materials to 2003 and 2009 consumers in the Packaging , according to a survey conducted in 2013 .
Metal moisturising and hydrating market were considered the Packaging materials market Metal both genders , with 36 % of women stating this as materials .
The Flexible_plastics moisturiser market takes up the largest proportion of the share Metal care market with a share of 41.6 % in 2003 .
